zserio.runtime.json

Class JsonWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • zserio.runtime.json.JsonWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, WalkObserver

    public final class JsonWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements WalkObserver, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Walker observer which dumps zserio objects to JSON format.

      • setItemSeparator

        public void setItemSeparator(java.lang.String itemSeparator)
        Sets custom item separator. Use with caution since setting of a wrong separator can lead to invalid JSON output.
        Parameters:
        itemSeparator - Item separator to set.

      • beginCompound

        public void beginCompound(java.lang.Object compound,
                          FieldInfo fieldInfo,
                          int elementIndex)
        Description copied from interface: WalkObserver
        Called at the beginning of an compound field object. Note that for uninitialized compounds (i.e. null) the visit_value method is called instead!
        Specified by:
        beginCompound in interface WalkObserver
        Parameters:
        compound - Compound zserio object.
        fieldInfo - Compound field info.
        elementIndex - Element index in array or NOT_ELEMENT if the compound is not in array.

      • visitValue

        public void visitValue(java.lang.Object value,
                       FieldInfo fieldInfo,
                       int elementIndex)
        Description copied from interface: WalkObserver
        Called when a simple (or an unset compound - i.e. None) value is reached.
        Specified by:
        visitValue in interface WalkObserver
        Parameters:
        value - Simple value.
        fieldInfo - Field info of the simple value.
        elementIndex - Element index in array or NOT_ELEMENT if the compound is not in array.
